DESCRIPTION: A secondary resource, displayed above energy. Gained by #yWinding #yUp.
Turn your winder, gaining some amount of #ycharge.
Spend charge to perform an action.
Spend ALL charge to perform an action.
Cogwheels passively grant #yCharge at the start of your turn.
The next time you try to #ySpin without enough charge, a Battery will be consumed to supply that much charge.
Parts are cards which activate to perform an effect if in your hand at the end of your turn.
When attacked, creatures lose 1 #yStrength for that turn per stack of Dizzy.
Activate the effect of the currently equipped tool twice, then replace it with a new one.
Attuned cards #yActuate when they're played or their part effect is activated.
Activate the effect of your equipped tool.
Tool. #b!B! #yBlock, #b!D! damage, adds #b!M! additional damage to your next attack.
Tool. #b!B! #yBlock, #b!D! damage, reduces the #yStrength of all enemies by #b!M! for the turn.
Proficiency increases the damage and #yBlock of Tools.
Trinkets are cards which draw a card when drawn, and #yExhaust when their part effect is activated.
